series: Advances in experimental medicine and biology -- v. 603
subtitle: from genomics to function
title: The genus Yersinia
by_statement: edited by Robert D. Perry and Jacqueline D. Fetherston.

notes.value:
"The 9th International Symposium on Yersinia was held in Lexington, Kentucky, USA, on October 10-14, 2006.... This Symposium volume is based on selected presentations from the meeting...."--Pref.

Includes bibliographical references and index.
